com.strandgenomics.imaging.iclient
Class PixelDataOverlay

java.lang.Object
  com.strandgenomics.imaging.iclient.ImageSpaceObject
      com.strandgenomics.imaging.iclient.PixelDataOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable, IPixelDataOverlay, Serializable
public class PixelDataOverlay
extends ImageSpaceObject
implements IPixelDataOverlay

Represents the overlay state of many pixel-data within a record

Author:
arunabha
See Also:
Serialized Form

getImage

public BufferedImage getImage(boolean zStacked,
                              boolean mosaic,
                              boolean useChannelColor,
                              Rectangle roi)
                       throws IOException
Description copied from interface: IPixelDataOverlay
Returns the RGB BufferedImage instance associated with this image source for specified ROI

Specified by:
getImage in interface IPixelDataOverlay
Parameters:
zStacked - true for Maximum Intensity Projection across slices, false otherwise
useChannelColor - true if a color image (based on the channel color) is returned, gray-scale image otherwise
roi - specified region of interest
Returns:
BufferedImage instance associated with this image source
Throws:
IOException
